comments: He is really good professor. Even I\'m an International student easy for me. Take this class you won\'t regret !

A few bigger assignments like a video and research paper but he gives you a lot of time to work on everything. Very nice and helpful. Final was cumulative but you were able to use all previous tests, papers and textbook.

Burmeister is a great professor! He is always there to help if you have questions or concerns even though sometimes it is still a bit confusing. I would take him again for a class! I continually use the textbook even today (I took last semester), it is a lot of help.

He focused the entire class on Environmental change. Every paper and project was focused on that, it got so bad at the end because most people could care less about environmental change. He\'s a somewhat easy grader, but it very unclear with the directions of pretty much everything. Vaguely describes how to do projects them marks you down for things

As a student who hates English I was dreading taking this class, but I\'m so glad that I took it with Mr. Burmeister. His test are fairly easy, including the final which is open book, open notes. There are only 4 papers, the longest being 1200 words. I expected to get a C in the class but got an A. If you have to take Engl250, take Mr. B if you can.
This turned out to be one of my favorite teachers, even though he tells the same stories over and over again. Really easy class also.
Such a great teacher! Very friendly guy and willing to help you out. Easy class, he tells you what he wants and grades fair. Easy tests, easy A. Open book, open note exam.
Was really funny and easy to understand. He has a "back in the old day" type attitude

Mr.B is by far the best English teacher I have ever had. He cares alot about his students and helps you out whenever you need help!He gives alot of time to get assignments completed and will work with you as long as you have a valid reason for late assignments!Book is helpful but was barly used except for a test. I highly suggest to take him!!!!!!
Did they have the same guy...he tells the same stories over and over. (in a monotone voice)

Mr. B is a very well and exciting professor to take. The class is very easy and he is always helpful. He seems to care alot about his students and makes sure that everyone does a good job. I highly suggest that you take this professor, you will not be sorry!
Professor Burmeister is an excellent professor. Take him if you can.
Very good teacher who truly cares about each and every student that he teaches. All u have to do is ask for help and he is there!

Mr. Burmeister and his wife (they team taught) are were the best teachers I have EVER had. The class is fairly easy but you learn SO much. They are very helpful and truly care about their students. The have each taught, coached, and worked as social workers for countless years. Their knowledge and experience is unparrelled.
